original_text: He told people, ‘You have done many wrong things. You must turn away from them and change how you live. Do this now, because the kingdom of heaven has come very near.’

sentences.original_text: You have done many wrong things
You must turn away from them

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 사는 방식을 바꿔야 한다

sentences.original_text: because the kingdom of heaven has come very near
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘 나라가 아주 가까이 왔기 때문이다
